sentences.en: A wolf, likes peripatetic wandering around lonely and prefers listening to the song.
sentences.cn: 一只喜欢孤独游走,且喜欢听歌的炎狼.

sentences.en: Accompanying the peripatetic Secretary of State on his shuttle diplomacy marathons.
sentences.cn: 伴随四处奔走的国务卿于穿梭外交的马拉松旅途上.

sentences.en: We are more and more a peripatetic planet or in plain English we move about more.
sentences.cn: 我们的星球越来越具流动性,换句话说就是我们越来越频繁的迁徙.

trans.tran_cn: （教师）在多所学校兼课的，徒步游历的，漫游的，巡回的
trans.tran_en: travelling from place to place, especially in order to do your job
